input_text.Prompt:
You will write a professional product description for a client based on the following product keywords and product title information.

Product title:
Arnold Homelite .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly

Product keywords:
Homelite/John Deere Trimmer Head Assembly
Fits John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers
Pre-wound trimmer spool
.095" diameter
input_text.Response A: The Arnold .095-Inch String Trimmer Head Assembly is designed to fit John Deere and Homelite straight shaft string trimmers. It comes pre-wound with a trimmer spool.
input_text.Response B: DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton is perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more. This DMC Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish. It is 1.76-ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius). Cebelia crochet cotton is available in a wide range of colors. Can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed. Highly colorfast. Comes in a variety of colors. measures 405-Yard length and comes in size 20.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: I thought it was a little too brief.
